entry.desc: BISICLES configure options. Currently not used

TRUE implies BISICLES interface is built with support for the BISICLES library. Linking to BISICLES must occur when building the E3SM executable. This occurs if this variable is set to TRUE. Note that is only available on a limited set of machines/compilers. This must remain FALSE to run another land ice model on a machine that does not have BISICLES, or for which the CIME scripts are not aware of the existence of BISICLES.
true => do surface mass balance, false => PDD, nec_glc is set to 1
